EmailTemplate.name: Lead Nurturing.Value Prop 5
EmailTemplate.subject: Simple Tax Management for Independent Consultants
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Are quarterly estimated tax filings a source of stress for your independent business? MBO Partners manages your business expenses so you get the immediate tax benefit each time you draw a paycheck. You pay taxes on your net earnings as you pay yourself, rather than estimating quarterlies. That means no more "shoe box" of receipts to go through every time you file, a lower audit risk for your return and more money in your pocket. You can learn more about how MBO works here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. Email info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com> today to talk to a Consultant Services Advisor, or give us a call at 1-800-220-0469. ___________________________________
MBO Partners
A Better Way for Independent Consultants to Do Business
t: 1-800-220-0469
